publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3097 Tommy Sheridan: Payment of Inheritance Tax by Her Majesty the Queen-That the Parliament believes that the royal family should be treated the same as any other taxpayer in the UK; further believes that Her Majesty the Queen should be paying the appropriate level of inheritance tax on Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth the Queen Mother's estate, and hopes that Her Majesty the Queen will resolve this issue before her attendance at the Scottish Parliament in Aberdeen on 28 May 2002.
